author: @psbjr
text: Just a note to people using this tutorial, if you are having trouble getting the dropdowns and chart to load, try using this jquery version in the script tag: https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.1.0/jquery.min.js  That fixed it for me (as well as making the graph work).
